function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Introduction of polluted air into the plant root system","Impact":"Risk of introducing contaminants into the plant root system, affecting the removal capacity of the plant","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling the quality of air introduced into the plant root system, ensuring it does not contain harmful pollutants","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, purification technologies","People":"Research team, air quality experts","Owner":"Research team, facility managers"},{"Description":"Long-term performance of the botanical air filtration system","Impact":"Potential decrease in effectiveness over time, leading to reduced air quality improvement","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of the filtration system, replacement of filter components as needed","Technologies":"Sensor technology, maintenance protocols","People":"Facility maintenance staff, air quality experts","Owner":"Facility owners, management"}]}
